values: A wave is a line of water that moves higher than the rest of the water.
The water was filled with large blue waves.

To wave is to move one's hand or arm back and forth to signal or greet someone.
A wave is a disturbance that travels through a medium, such as water or air, and can be seen as a pattern of up-and-down or back-and-forth motion.
noun, verb, idiom
